Source code for Playground.Python_Staff.decorators.functols_wraps

from functools import wraps



[docs]def preserving_decorator(func):
    @wraps(func)
    def wrapper(*args, **kwargs):
        """Doc in decorator"""
        return func(*args, **kwargs)

    return wrapper




[docs]def NOT_preserving_decorator(func):
    def wrapper(*args, **kwargs):
        """Docstring in decorator"""
        return func(*args, **kwargs)

    return wrapper




[docs]@preserving_decorator
def function_with_docstring():
    """Important documentation"""




[docs]@NOT_preserving_decorator
def function_with_docstring2():
    """Important documentation"""



if __name__ == "__main__":
    print(function_with_docstring.__name__)
    print(function_with_docstring.__doc__)
    print("_" * 20)
    print(function_with_docstring2.__name__)
    print(function_with_docstring2.__doc__)
